short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A random choice couldn't be easier!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A random choice couldn't be easier!

Write a list of options with comma separated and input a number of options to choose to get random result!

Now Options may be saved! The saved Option Groups are now available, so you can build Option Groups for anything you need!

The list of options and the number of options to choose are saved on local storage, so you can reuse it for next results.
